message.body: So Anna is breaking up with me
Oh man, i am so sorry! how are you doing? i am at my grandparents' now, but do you want to talk later tonight?
Yeah. Becca is here now but talking later is good
I'm going to bed. Ill call you at some point tomorrow?
Ok, sleep well! love you. talk to you tomorrow.
Quick question: are you gonna have a car in Philly?
That is my current plan! does that help you in some way? are you still able to talk later?

Yeah I can talk later. I am considering leaving my car home because the only thing I would need it for is seeing you - public transportation between west Philly and Germantown is complicated. But if you have a car that makes it more possible, and it really doesn't make sense for me to keep my car here
Can you google chat at any point today?
Yeah! i would love too. could it be a little later though?
Hmich and Emily can do it around 6:50 so in gonna do that...you can join when you're around or we can talk later
Dammit, i'm really sorry i missed this. i can do around 10 or tomorrow after 5, would either of those times work?
Hi! ready to talk when you are! do you want to talk on the phone or skype?
No worries! sounds great! see you there :)
